front.title: IEEE Standard for Layer 2 Transport Protocol for Time Sensitive Applications in a Bridged Local Area Network
front.abstract: The protocol, data encapsulations, and presentation time procedures used to ensure interoperability between audio- and video-based end stations that use standard networking services provided by all IEEE 802 networks meeting quality-of-service requirements for time sensitive applications by leveraging concepts of IEC 61883 are specified in this standard.
